html:
November 3, 2000

 

MEMORANDUM TO EDITORS AND CORRESPONDENTS:

 

The FEC Press Office has been alerted to certain information omitted from the original release. This information pertains to two candidates:

Challenger: Philip P. Sudan, Jr (R)....TX/25

Open Seat: Rodney D. Driver (R).....RI/02

Corrected information will be posted on the FEC web site www.fec.gov and copies may be obtained from the FEC Press Office.

The information includes the appropriate state/district pages with these candidates now listed. Also, summary statistical pages and rankings are affected.

All corrections appear in bold print and are marked accordingly.
